zh.title: Hapunan 游戏概览：探索菲律宾恐怖世界
zh.description: 深入了解 Hapunan，这款以菲律宾民间传说为灵感的恐怖游戏。探索其独特的游戏机制、恐怖元素和令人胆寒的故事情节。

en.title: Hapunan Game Overview: Exploring the Filipino Horror Experience
en.description: Dive into Hapunan, a horror game inspired by Filipino folklore. Explore its unique mechanics, terrifying elements, and spine-chilling storyline.

zh.title: Hapunan 生存指南：如何在恐怖夜晚活下来
zh.description: 探索Hapunan，这款菲律宾恐怖游戏的生存策略。从如何躲避恶灵到掌握游戏机制，这篇指南将帮助你在黑暗中存活。

en.title: Hapunan Survival Guide: How to Make It Through the Night
en.description: Discover the essential survival strategies for Hapunan, the Filipino horror game. Learn how to evade spirits, use resources wisely, and uncover hidden secrets.

zh.title: Hapunan 游戏故事背景解析
zh.description: 深入探索Hapunan的恐怖故事背景，了解其灵感来源于菲律宾的神秘传说，以及游戏中的超自然现象和生存挑战。

en.title: Hapunan Game Lore: The Dark Legends Behind the Horror
en.description: Explore the terrifying lore behind Hapunan, inspired by Filipino myths and folklore. Discover the supernatural elements and survival challenges that make this game unique.
